Name: SUPABASE_SERVICE_URL
Where: .env.local; Cloudflare Worker (plain text); GitHub Actions (secret ok)

Name: MAILCHANNELS_SMTP_PASSWORD
Where: .env.local; Cloudflare Worker (secret, hvis du bruker SMTP); GitHub Actions (secret)

Name: MAIL_FROM_ADDRESS
Where: .env.local; Cloudflare Worker (plain text); GitHub Actions (secret or variable)

Name: UNSUBSCRIBE_SECRET
Source: Egen generert hemmelig streng (f.eks. openssl rand -hex 32)

Name: DISPATCH_TOKEN
Source: Egen generert hemmelig streng for worker-auth
